stack.name: common_msgs
stack.description: A set of code and messages that are widely useful within the ROS ecosystem. The messages for diagnostics within ROS are defined in the diagnostic_msgs packge. There are geometric primitaves in the geometry_msgs package. Commonly used navigation related messages are in the nav_msgs package. And the sensor_msgs package defines messages for interacting with common sensors, such as cameras, scanning laser range finders, and generic 3d sensors with point clouds.
stack.author: Maintained by Tully Foote tfoote@willowgarage.com
